医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
COVID-19 对洛杉矶县的长期心理健康影响不平等《PLOS ONE》杂志最近的一项研究表明，关于洛杉矶县 COVID-19 大流行的长期影响出现了新的证据。南加州大学和洛杉矶县公共卫生部 (DPH) 的科学家发现，白人和非白人居民之间现有的心理健康差距进一步恶化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Long-term-mental-health-impacts-of-COVID-19-unequal-in-LA-county.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Long-term-mental-health-impacts-of-COVID-19-unequal-in-LA-county.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc5552fc-739a-4fdc-b8fb-2324cc31a3c4 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 00:04:37 -0400 Long-term mental health impacts of COVID-19 unequal in LA county
饮食可以改变你的生理年龄吗？研究表明，健康饮食可以降低表观遗传年龄，而添加糖会加速中年黑人和白人女性的衰老。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Can-diet-alter-your-biological-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Can-diet-alter-your-biological-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c40aadb0-66fd-498d-8dce-23601fb51fc5 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 00:02:00 -0400 Can diet alter your biological age?
创新的组织切片方法可改善临床结果中国南京鼓楼医院赵元金领导的研究团队在《工程》杂志上发表了一篇研究论文，这是生物医学领域的一项开创性发展。这篇题为“基于分层磁性微针阵列机器人的可控组织切开术”的文章介绍了一种组织切片和培养的新技术，该技术可以彻底改变临床环境中处理原发组织的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Innovative-tissue-slicing-method-for-improved-clinical-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Innovative-tissue-slicing-method-for-improved-clinical-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a15675b-dd89-4639-a296-078931730d8c Tue, 30 Jul 2024 23:58:00 -0400 Innovative tissue slicing method for improved clinical outcomes
健康的生活习惯可显着降低长期的 COVID-19 风险研究表明，保持健康的生活方式可以显着降低因 COVID-19 导致严重长期并发症、住院和死亡的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Healthy-lifestyle-habits-dramatically-cut-long-term-COVID-19-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Healthy-lifestyle-habits-dramatically-cut-long-term-COVID-19-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a8edfc9-5706-4aab-b7c8-43354f265458 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 23:12:00 -0400 Healthy lifestyle habits dramatically cut long-term COVID-19 risks
失去亲人会加速生物衰老并影响长期健康家庭损失与加速的生物衰老有关，尤其是在成年期发生损失时，凸显了丧亲之痛对健康的长期影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Losing-loved-ones-accelerates-biological-aging-and-impacts-long-term-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Losing-loved-ones-accelerates-biological-aging-and-impacts-long-term-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7241c515-47f1-465c-9374-c441b7a92b76 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 22:48:00 -0400 Losing loved ones accelerates biological aging and impacts long-term health
野生动物物种表现出与人类活动相关的高 SARS-CoV-2 暴露率研究人员在六种野生动物中发现了 SARS-CoV-2 RNA，并且在人类活动频繁的地区发现了更高的血清阳性率。确定了 7 个新的 Omicron 变种人传动物事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Wildlife-species-show-high-SARS-CoV-2-exposure-linked-to- human-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Wildlife-species-show-high-SARS-CoV-2-exposure-linked-to- human-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f98575b8-8cdc-483c-aff7-13f926f94183 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 22:27:00 -0400 Wildlife species show high SARS-CoV-2 exposure linked to human activity
宾夕法尼亚大学的研究人员找到了一种方法来区分疾病风险的遗传和环境影响每种疾病都受到遗传因素以及空气污染、气候和社会经济地位等环境因素的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Penn-researchers-find-a-way-to-tease-apart-genic-and-environmental-effects-of-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Penn-researchers-find-a-way-to-tease-apart-genic-and-environmental-effects-of-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=934408e4-1544-43a5-aa0c-4cba4b915d79 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 21:36:00 -0400 Penn researchers find a way to tease apart genetic and environmental effects of disease risk
研究将组织驻留记忆 T 细胞与改善肺癌预后联系起来Terasaki 研究所进行的一项广泛的分析研究发表在《免疫学前沿》上，强调了组织驻留记忆 T 细胞的关键作用，以及它们如何影响非小细胞肺癌患者的免疫环境及其总体预后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Study-links-tissue-resident-memory-T-cells-to-improved-lung-cancer-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Study-links-tissue-resident-memory-T-cells-to-improved-lung-cancer-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47835cf0-f731-4749-92cc-3dd4c200b129 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 21:27:15 -0400 Study links tissue-resident memory T cells to improved lung cancer outcomes
miR-205 基因缺失促进小鼠乳腺发育，揭示抑制乳腺癌的新见解小鼠中 miR-205 的遗传缺失增强了乳腺发育和分支，挑战了先前的致死性研究结果并强调了其肿瘤抑制功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Genetic-loss-of-miR-205-boosts-mammary-gland-development-in-mice-reveals-new-insights-into-breast-cancer-抑制.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Genetic-loss-of-miR-205-boosts-mammary-gland-development-in-mice-reveals-new-insights-into-breast-cancer-抑制.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abb35576-2509-4965-8b15-66e5f3570fd0 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 21:06:00 -0400 Genetic loss of miR-205 boosts mammary gland development in mice, reveals new insights into breast cancer suppression
研究人员发现与 ALS 恢复相关的关键基因变异尽管极为罕见，但一些被诊断患有肌萎缩侧索硬化症 (ALS) 的人从这种致命的神经退行性疾病中部分或完全康复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Researchers-identify-key-genic-variants-linked-to-ALS-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Researchers-identify-key-genic-variants-linked-to-ALS-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f70959f8-ec52-43c4-9db0-91a020a0e632 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 20:59:51 -0400 Researchers identify key genetic variants linked to ALS recovery
